sneckomod:D8.NAME: Mystical Octahedron
OPTIONS: [Locked] Requires a card that uses a randomly chosen number.

DESCRIPTIONS: Creativity triumphs over planning every time.

sneckomod:Serpent.NAME: The Ssssserpent
DESCRIPTIONS: You walk into a room to find a large hole in the ground. As you approach the hole, an enormous scaled creature, not unlike yourself, appears from within. NL NL ~"Ho~ ~hooo!~ ~Hello~ ~snake~ ~friend!~ Let me ask you something... NL NL You hear the serpent speak words, but find yourself utterly perplexed, comprehending none of it. NL NL "Do you agree?"

~"Excellent!"~ NL NL You still have no idea what the question was, but it appears you've made the Serpent's day. NL The creature offers you a trinket to assist in your goal, then slithers back into the hole.
The serpent stares at you with a look of extreme disappointment, but ultimately smiles and wishes you well on your journey.
